recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Manajemen Informatika, Teknik Informatika (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will assist in monitoring and controlling inventory by comparing actual stock with system records, identifying discrepancies, and supporting daily inventory checks. The role also includes helping develop or improve the inventory tracking system to enhance accuracy, transparency, and ease of monitoring. This position is onsite at the Gunung Putri plant.
